2COR 11.2 unte aljanonds izwis gudis aljana;
gawadjoda auk izwis ainamma waira mauja swikna du usgiban Xristau.
2COR 11.3 aþþan og, ibai aufto swaswe waurms Aiwwan uslutoda filudeisein seinai, riurja wairþaina fraþja izwara af ainfalþein jah swiknein þizai in Xristau.
2COR 11.4 jabai nu sa qimanda anþarana Iesu mereiþ, þanei weis ni meridedum, aiþþau ahman anþarana nimiþ, þanei ni nemuþ, aiþþau aiwaggeljon anþara þoei ni andnemuþ, waila usþulaideduþ.
2COR 11.5 man auk ni waihtai mik minnizo gataujan þaim ufar mikil wisandam apaustaulum.
2COR 11.6 jabai unhrains im waurda, akei ni kunþja;
aþþan in allamma gabairhtidai in allaim du izwis.
2COR 11.7 aiþþau ibai frawaurht tawida, mik silban haunjands, ei jus ushauhjaindau, unte arwjo gudis aiwaggeljon merida izwis?
2COR 11.8 anþaros aikklesjons birauboda, nimands andawizn du izwaramma andbahtja, jah wisands at izwis jah ushaista ni ainnohun kaurida;
2COR 11.9 unte þarbos meinos usfullidedun broþrjus qimandans af Makidonai, jah in allaim unkaureinom izwis mik silban fastaida jah fasta.
2COR 11.10 ist sunja Xristaus in mis, unte so ƕoftuli ni faurdammjada in mis in landa Akaje.
2COR 11.12 iþ þatei tauja jah taujan haba, ei usmaitau inilon þize wiljandane inilon, ei in þammei ƕopand, bigitaindau swaswe jah weis.
2COR 11.13 unte þai swaleikai galiugaapaustauleis, waurstwjans hindarweisai, gagaleikondans sik du apaustaulum Xristaus.
2COR 11.14 jah nist sildaleik, unte silba Satana gagaleikoþ sik aggilau liuhadis.
2COR 11.15 nist mikil, jabai andbahtos is gagaleikond sik swe andbahtos garaihteins, þizeei andeis wairþiþ bi waurstwam ize.
2COR 11.16 aftra qiþa, ibai ƕas mik muni unfrodana;
aiþþau waila þau swe unfrodana nimaiþ mik, ei jah ik leitil ƕa ƕopau.
2COR 11.17 þatei rodja ni rodja bi fraujan, ak swe in unfrodein in þamma stomin þizos ƕoftuljos.
2COR 11.18 unte managai ƕopand bi leika, jah ik ƕopa.
2COR 11.19 unte azetaba usþulaiþ þans unwitans, frodai wisandans.
2COR 11.20 usþulaiþ, jabai ƕas izwis gaþiwaiþ, jabai ƕas fraïtiþ, jabai ƕas usnimiþ, jabai ƕas in arbaidai briggiþ, jabai ƕas izwis in andawleizn slahiþ.
2COR 11.21 bi unsweriþai qiþa, swe þatei weis siukai weseima;
iþ in þammei ƕe ƕas anananþeiþ, in unfrodein qiþa, gadars jah ik;
in arbaidim managizeim, in karkarom ufarassau, in slahim ufarassau, in dauþeinim ufta;
2COR 11.24 fram Iudaium fimf sinþam fidwor tiguns ainamma wanans nam;
2COR 11.25 þrim sinþam wandum usbluggwans was;
þrim sinþam usfarþon gatawida us skipa;
naht jah dag in diupiþai was mareins;

2COR 11.26 wratodum ufta, bireikeim aƕo, bireikeim waidedjane, bireikeim us kunja, bireikeim us þiudom, bireikeim in baurg, bireikeim in auþidai, bireikeim in marein, bireikeim in galiugabroþrum, 2COR 11.27 aglom jah arbaidim, in wokainim ufta, in gredau jah þaurstein, in lausqiþreim ufta, in friusa jah naqadein;
2COR 11.28 inuh þo afar þata arbaiþs meina seiteina, saurga meina allaim aikklesjom.
2COR 11.29 ƕas siukiþ, jah ni siukau?
ƕas afmarzjada, jah ik ni tundnau?
2COR 11.30 jabai ƕopan skuld sijai, þaim siukeins meinaizos ƕopau.
2COR 11.31 guþ jah atta fraujins Iesuis wait, sa þiuþeiga du aiwam, þatei ni liuga.

2COR 11.32 in Damaskon fauramaþleis þiudos Araitins þiudanis witaida baurg Damaskai gafahan mik wiljands, 2COR 11.33 jah þairh augadauro in snorjon athahans was and baurgswaddjau jah unþaþlauh handuns is.
